t.t-if: widget.pos.config and widget.pos.config.enable_credit and orderline.get_product().id == widget.pos.config.prod_for_payment[0]

widget.pos.config.enable_credit and widget.pos.get_client() and widget.pos.credit_amount and widget.pos.get_order() and widget.pos.get_order().get_credit_detail() and widget.pos.get_order().get_credit_detail()[0]
widget.pos.config.use_pricelist and order.pricelist != widget.pos.default_pricelist and orderline.get_display_price() != orderline.get_original_price()

t.t-value: (line.discount === 0 and line.unit_name === "Units" and line.quantity === 1 and !discount_to_show and !(line.display_discount_policy == "without_discount" && line.price != line.price_lst))

t.t-if: widget.pos.config.enable_credit and widget.pos.config.receipt_balance and widget.pos.get_client() and widget.pos.get_order() and widget.pos.get_order().get_credit_detail() and widget.pos.get_order().get_credit_detail()[0]
